means: 在（某人或某事物的）前面

sentence.Network_en: He looked straight ahead and overtook a lumbering lorry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他眼睛直视前方，加速超过了前面一辆慢吞吞行进的大卡车。

sentence.Network_en: Mark was out of earshot, walking ahead of them.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克走在前面，听不见他们的声音。

sentence.Network_en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentence.Network_cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

list.abs: 最常用的英文日常用语_爱问知识人 ... Get cold feet. 害怕做某事。 Go ahead. 继续。 Help me out. 帮帮我。.
go after　 追求go ahead　 开始,前进,领先go along with　 陪同前往,随行

lj.lj_ly: she walked ahead of him along the corridor.
lj.lj_ls: 她沿着走廊在他前面走。

jx.jx_en_mean: innovative and radical by the standards of the time; more characteristic of a later age
jx.jx_cn_mean: 超前的，比所处时代激进的；更具未来时代特征的

jx.jx_en_mean: To be winning or in a superior position

lj.lj_ly: The home team was ahead in the second period. Your company is ahead in developing the new technology.
lj.lj_ls: 主队在第二阶段的比赛中处于领先。你们的公司在发展新科技方面处于领先地位

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally in nautical use): from a- 'in, at' + head

usage_note.note: In addition to the uses shown below, ahead is used in phrasal verbs such as ‘get ahead’, ‘go ahead’, and ‘press ahead’.
usage_note.translation: 除下列用法外，ahead还可用于get ahead，go ahead，press ahead等短语动词中。

entry.def: Something that is ahead is in front of you. If you look ahead, you look directly in front of you.

example.ex: Brett looked straight ahead...
example.tran: 布雷特直视前方。

example.ex: I peered ahead through the front screen...
example.tran: 我透过面前的挡风玻璃凝视前方。

entry.tran: （与push，move和forge等动词连用表示计划或组织等）进展迅速地
entry.def: You use ahead with verbs such as 'push', 'move', and 'forge' to indicate that a plan, scheme, or organization is making fast progress.

example.ex: We are moving ahead with plans to send financial aid...
example.tran: 我们提供财政援助的计划进展顺利。

example.ex: Now BBC World Television is forging ahead on its own.
example.tran: 现在英国广播公司的全球电视节目正靠自己的力量稳步推进。

entry.def: If you are ahead in your work or achievements, you have made more progress than you expected to and are performing well.

example.ex: The North Korean economy was pretty strong in its time, and was ahead until maybe 1970...
example.tran: 朝鲜的经济曾经相当强大，大约在1970年之前都是超前发展。

example.ex: First half profits have charged ahead from £127.6m to £134.2m...
example.tran: 上半年的利润已超过预计的1.276亿英镑达到1.342亿英镑。

entry.def: If a person or a team is ahead in a competition, they are winning.

example.ex: Australia were ahead throughout the game...
example.tran: 澳大利亚队在整场比赛都处于领先地位。

example.ex: Scotland were ahead in their European championship qualifier in Iceland...
example.tran: 苏格兰队在冰岛举行的欧洲杯预选赛中处于领先位置。

entry.def: Ahead also means in the future.

example.ex: A much bigger battle is ahead for the president...
example.tran: 一场更为艰巨的战斗正等待着总统。

example.ex: Anne Garrels reports there are still difficult times ahead for Poland...
example.tran: 安妮·加雷尔斯报道说波兰仍然将面临一段艰苦的时期。

entry.def: If you prepare or plan something ahead, you do it some time before a future event so that everything is ready for that event to take place.

example.ex: The government wants figures that help it to plan ahead...
example.tran: 政府需要一些有助于其提前制订计划的数据。

example.ex: Do book ahead as the restaurant is very popular...
example.tran: 该饭店非常受欢迎，请务必提前预订。

entry.def: If you go ahead, or if you go on ahead, you go in front of someone who is going to the same place so that you arrive there some time before they do.

example.ex: I went ahead and waited with Sean...
example.tran: 我先走的，和肖恩一起在那儿等。

example.ex: You just go on ahead. I'll come by later...
example.tran: 你只管先往前走。我随后就来。

entry.def: If someone is ahead of you, they are directly in front of you. If someone is moving ahead of you, they are in front of you and moving in the same direction.

example.ex: I saw a man in a blue jacket thirty metres ahead of me...
example.tran: 我看见在我前面30米处有一个身穿蓝色夹克的男人。

example.ex: She walked ahead of Helene up the steps into the hotel.
example.tran: 她在海伦妮前面迈上台阶，进了旅馆。

entry.def: If an event or period of time lies ahead of you, it is going to happen or take place soon or in the future.

example.ex: I tried to think about all the problems that were ahead of me tomorrow...
example.tran: 我试图考虑明天我将面临的所有问题。

example.ex: She spent all night thinking about the future that lay ahead of her...
example.tran: 她整夜未睡，满脑子都想着她未来的前途。

entry.def: In a competition, if a person or team does something ahead of someone else, they do it before the second person or team.

example.ex: Millar finished 1 minute and 35 seconds ahead of Thierry Claveyrolat.
example.tran: 米勒领先蒂埃里·克拉韦罗拉1分35秒完成比赛。

entry.def: If something happens ahead of an event or time, it happens before that event or time.

example.ex: The Prime Minister was speaking ahead of today's meeting.
example.tran: 首相在今天的会议开始之前作了发言。

entry.def: If something happens ahead of schedule or ahead of time, it happens earlier than was planned.

example.ex: The election was held six months ahead of schedule...
example.tran: 选举提前了6个月举行。

example.ex: This dish may be prepared a day ahead of time and refrigerated.
example.tran: 这道菜可以提前一天准备好并冷藏起来。

entry.def: If someone is ahead of someone else, they have made more progress and are more advanced in what they are doing.

example.ex: Henry generally stayed ahead of the others in the academic subjects.
example.tran: 亨利的文化课成绩通常都优于其他学生。

means.word_mean: 1. having the leading position or higher score in a contest;

sentences.sentence: "he is ahead by a pawn"
"the leading team in the pennant race"
"I see the lights of a town ahead"
"the road ahead is foggy"
"staring straight ahead"
"we couldn't see over the heads of the people in front"
"with the cross of Jesus marching on before"

means.word_mean: 2. toward the future; forward in time;

sentences.sentence: "I like to look ahead in imagination to what the future may bring"
"I look forward to seeing you"
"go ahead"
"the train moved ahead slowly"
"the boat lurched ahead"
"moved onward into the forest"
"they went slowly forward in the mud"
"when you pay ahead (or in advance) you receive a discount"
"We like to plan ahead"
"should have made reservations beforehand"

means.word_mean: 5. to a more advanced or advantageous position;

sentences.sentence: "a young man sure to get ahead"
"pushing talented students ahead"

means.word_mean: 6. to a different or a more advanced time (meaning advanced either toward the present or toward the future);

sentences.sentence: "moved the appointment ahead from Tuesday to Monday"
"pushed the deadline ahead from Tuesday to Wednesday"

means.word_mean: 7. leading or ahead in a competition;

sentences.sentence: "the horse was three lengths ahead going into the home stretch"
"ahead by two pawns"
"our candidate is in the lead in the polls"
"way out front in the race"
"the advertising campaign put them out front in sales"

auth_sentence.content: Someone with a very good future ahead of them?
auth_sentence.res_content: Someone with a very good future ahead of them?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Someone with a very good future ahead of them?

auth_sentence.content: Mr Swinney said the challenges ahead were not unusual.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Swinney said the challenges ahead were not unusual.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Swinney said the challenges ahead were not unusual.

auth_sentence.content: Because the problems that lie ahead are truly enormous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because the problems that lie ahead are truly enormous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because the problems that lie ahead are truly enormous.

Sentence.sentence: So why are American women so far ahead of their Swedish counterparts in breaking through the glass ceiling?

in a 2012 report,the World Economic Forum found that when it comes to closing the gender gap in"economic participation and opportunity,"the United States is ahead of not only Sweden but also Finland,Denmark,the Netherlands,Iceland,Germany,and the United Kingdom
Apple stands to win as well, hooking more young consumers with decades of technology purchases ahead of them.

means.word_mean: 在(某人或某事物的)前面

sentences.en: Do you know the man ahead?

jushi.english: Well, if you apply about a year ahead, you should get a grant.
jushi.chinese: 唔，你若是提早一年左右申请，应该会获得助学金的。

jushi.english: Francesca was staring ahead into the darkness.
jushi.chinese: 弗朗西斯卡凝视着漆黑的前方。

jushi.english: We have made rapid strides ahead despite these initial handicaps.
jushi.chinese: 尽管开始时作了让步，我们现在已快步领先。
